messages.subject: Hannah
messages.msgSnippet: Dear friends, I write to you today to update you on Hannah s condition.  I don t have all the details, only that she has taken a turn for the worse.  She came
messages.messageBody:
Dear friends,
I write to you today to update you on Hannah's condition. I don't have all
the details, only that she has taken a turn for the worse. She came home
Tuesday evening, and then Diana had to take her back into the hospital
Wednesday afternoon.

At present, she has some very serious life threatening infection raging
through her body. She is in a medically induced coma and surrounded by
family.

My request is that every one of you please light a candle for Hannah and
keep it burning so that your light and energy may reach her right now.
Please keep her and Diana and Hayden in your hearts and send them some very
serious healing energy.

I will do my best to keep you informed. I haven't spoken with Diana
personally, yet. She and Hayden was resting when I called.

Please forward this on to those who need to know.

In love and light,
Karen
